Interventions aimed at preventing iron deficiency and IDA in pregnancy include iron supplemen -
tation, fortification of staple foods with iron, health and nutrition education, control of parasitic 
infections, and improvements in sanitation. During pregnancy, women need to consume additional 
iron to ensure they have sufficient iron stores to prevent iron deficiency. Therefore, in most low-
